message: I have a great deal for you on this amazing product! I'm willing to let it go for $180.
That's a bit steep for me. I'm only willing to pay $100 for it.  What do you say?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $140 is still too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $120. Let me know what you think.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $130?
I'm really trying to stay within my budget, and $130 is still a bit more than I can afford right now. How about we split the difference at $125? It's a fair price for both of us.
I'm not sure I can go any lower than $130, but I'll think about it. Let me see if I can do a bit better. How about $128?
